title: Export Sales Executive - Nhân Viên Kinh Doanh Quốc Tế
job_description:
We are looking for an Export Sales Executive to join our team in the food and consumer goods industry.
Key Responsibilities:
Develop and maintain relationships with international clients and partners.
Identify and approach potential customers in global markets.
Handle sales inquiries, negotiate contracts, and close deals.
Coordinate with the logistics and operations team to ensure smooth order fulfillment.
Conduct market research to explore new business opportunities.
Prepare sales reports and maintain customer databases.
requirements:
1 year experience required
Strong communication and negotiation skills in English.
Proactive, goal-oriented, and eager to learn.
Ability to work independently and in a team.
Background in International Business, Business Administration, or related fields is a plus.
